WorkItem.ClosedComment:
I think this was intentional:

Chrome:
```
> Blob.prototype.close
undefined
> File.prototype.close
undefined
> Blob.prototype.msClose
undefined
```

IE 11:
```
> Blob.prototype.close
undefined
> Blob.prototype.msClose
function msClose() { [native code] }
```
WorkItem.Description:
Hey guys,

In TypeScript 0.9.5 the Blob interface had a "close" method and a "msClose" method.
In TypeScript 1.0RC the close method is removed, is this intentional?
